title: Interpretation of seeing spoiled food in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: In most cases, spoiled food in a dream indicates problems and fears in life, and the interpretation of the vision varies depending on whether the dreamer is a man, whether he is single, married, a single girl, or a married or married woman. pregnant woman. We will discuss the interpretation of seeing spoiled food in a dream in detail as follows: Interpretation of seeing spoiled food by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that when a person sees spoiled food in a dream or eats it, this is a sign of the dreamer’s poor condition, the failure of his situation, and his exposure to many problems and fears in his life. But if he eats Eating food and thanking God for what He has given him, as this is a sign of the spaciousness of life and abundance of sustenance, and it is also a sign of getting rid of and removing the problems and problems that exist in his life. Distress and worry are from the will of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing spoiled food for a single woman. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating spoiled food, this is an indication of her poor condition and the emergence of problems in her life and she faces many pressures in the traps you create for her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing spoiled food for a married woman if she sees For a married woman in her dream that she is eating spoiled food, this is a sign that there are problems between her and her husband or between her and her husband’s family. But if someone gives her this spoiled food, this is evidence that this person wants to cause trouble between the dreamer’s family and between her and her husband, and is waiting for her with all evil. And evil, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing spoiled food for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating spoiled food, this is a sign that she will be exposed to trouble in the coming period of her life, but if she eats food and praises God, this is a sign that she is safe from all harm and evil, and that the fetus is safe and healthy. Also, God willing. But if someone gives her spoiled food in a dream, this is a sign that this person wants everything bad and evil for her and does not want her comfort, happiness, prosperity, and stability in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing spoiled food for a manWhen a person sees in his dream that he is eating food If it is spoiled, this is an indication of his loss in his work and he faces many problems and challenges in his professional and scientific life, but if he praises God for this food, this indicates that. Free yourself from worries and problems, God willing. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we will take your comments at the bottom of the article on the website and we will provide you with the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the angel of death speaking to me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of the Angel of Death speaking to me in a dream.Interpretation of a dream of the Angel of Death speaking to me in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of the Angel of Death speaking to me in a dream could be an indication of a long life and God knows the unseenSimilarly, if a married woman sees the Angel of Death speaking to her, this may lead to happiness And God knows the unseen. When you see the angel of death speaking to you in a dream, this may be evidence of Saladin, and God knows best. Likewise, if the girl sees the angel that the angel of death is speaking to her, then this can be interpreted as being against her, and praise be to God, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about an angel Death wearing white clothes in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about the angel of death wearing white clothes in a dream could be an indication of contentment with God, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the angel of death in white clothes can also express the goodness of the situation, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see the angel of death wearing white clothes in a dream This could be evidence of your performing religious duties, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the angel of death in white clothes can also express goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from the angel of death in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from the angel of death in a dream could be a sign of sin and God. He knows the unseen. As his guilt due to his bad deeds may suggest, God is also Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing escaping from the angel of death may also indicate the need to repent, and God knows best. When a married man sees himself escaping from the angel of death, it may be a sign that he has been warned to repent before It is too late, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the angel of death wanting to hold my soul in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the angel of death wanting to hold my soul in a dream. It could be a warning sign to abandon sins, and God knows best, as it may indicate a sin that has been committed and needs to be repented, and God knows the unseen. In the event that it is seen An unmarried girl: The angel of death takes her soul, so it may be a warning sign to repent of sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the angel of death taking the soul and then returning it, this may mean returning from a trip to a loved one, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the angel of death in the form of Woman in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing the angel of death in the form of a woman in a dream could be a sign of hypocrisy, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the angel of death in the form of a woman in a dream, this may be evidence of his hypocrisy in religion, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees the angel of death in the form of a woman For a man, this may indicate safety, and God knows best. It could also be a sign of strength and security after fear, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a married person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a married person in a dream could be a sign of not good things, as the death of a married man may indicate his separation from His wife, and God knows best. When she sees the death of a living person, it can lead to success, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the death of a living person, this may portend goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a child dying in an accident in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about socks by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of socks in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Socks in a dream are considered evidence of saving money and the desire to earn a lot of profits. The appearance of the smell of perfume from socks in a dream is evidence of halal money. The appearance of an unpleasant odor from socks is a sign of theft and illicit money. Seeing torn socks in a dream is evidence of... Preventing the dreamer from paying alms and zakat. Socks in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s weakness. Interpretation of a dream about socks for single women. If a girl sees that she is buying white socks, this indicates effort, hard work and diligence. Seeing yourself buying black socks shows a strong will. If a girl sees herself As she changes socks with a friend, this indicates her inability to make a decision. Interpretation of a dream about socks for a married woman White socks in a dream are an indication of a praiseworthy vision, because they indicate prosperity in life. Dreaming of clean children’s socks is a sign of good children’s circumstances. Vision A husband's socks in a dream is a sign of livelihood and profit. Interpretation of a dream about socks for pregnant women. White socks in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of the health of the fetus. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing socks in a dream is a sign of an imminent birth. Seeing a pregnant woman washing socks in a dream indicates the occurrence of Some positive changes in her life. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing green socks indicates blessing and abundance. Seeing socks in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of an easy birth. In general, socks in a dream are a sign of goodness, happiness, and good luck. Interpretation of a dream about socks for a man: Seeing torn socks in a dream is evidence On unpleasant things that will happen in the dreamer’s life. Seeing repairing socks in a dream means that the wife is helping her husband. Seeing socks in a dream for a man means work. Seeing a man wearing socks in a dream means that money is protected from loss. If one sees worn and torn socks in his dream, This means that he does not pay zakat. Socks in a young man’s dream are an indication of the happiness and quality they obtain. Interpretation of a dream about socks in a dream about Nablus. Distinctive socks in a dream will indicate problems that the dreamer will fall into. Seeing socks with clear water in a dream indicates happiness and good deeds. Wearing white socks It indicates the connection of an unmarried young man with a good girl. Interpretation of losing socks in a dream: Seeing socks in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer wants to collect money and keep it. Losing socks in a dream is a sign of losing money. Seeing socks in a dream with a beautiful and wonderful perfume indicates that the dreamer wants to earn money. It is halal, and losing socks means that the dreamer will be robbed or defrauded. Seeing socks in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is a person with a weak character. That vision of losing socks in a dream is generally a sign of wasting money. Losing socks in a dream for a single woman is evidence that the girl has made a mistake. In her life and everyone knows that, because socks in a single woman’s dream are evidence of coverings. Interpretation of the gift of socks in a dream if

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing rosemary in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a wreath plant in a dream. A strange and unrealistic dream in his sleep leads to anxiety and psychological discomfort. It is used in preparing different types of food, in addition to being used in various treatments because of its many health benefits. We have collected for you interpretations from translation books and great insights. Here, dear followers, is the complete interpretation of seeing rosemary in a dream for single women, men, and pregnant women. A complete interpretation of the interpretation of rosemary in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that rosemary in a dream promises many sorrows, worries, and disagreements in the dreamer’s life. Also, Seeing a whole stalk of rosemary in a dream indicates the dissolution and end of the marital relationship between the husband and his wife, and grief befalls her. Also, putting rosemary in food indicates the stability of her life naturally and the end of disputes and problems. Interpretation of seeing rosemary in a dream complete for a common woman. Buying rosemary indicates However, she will marry an invalid man who will not lose his God and will not commit many sins. Also, seeing rosemary in a girl’s dream indicates the collapse of her problems, excellence in her life, and success in her studies. Also, seeing rosemary in a complete dream indicates that the girl will get rid of all If a married woman dreams that she is eating rosemary, this indicates the removal of her worries and the psychological comfort she sees. Also, seeing rosemary in a full dream for a married woman indicates the loss of her husband’s job in His trade and indicates a passing financial crisis. Also, seeing rosemary in a dream expresses disobedience and sins that the dreamer committed in his dream and lack of repentance to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing rosemary in a dream is complete for a man. When a person sees rosemary in his dream, this indicates his disobedience to his Lord, But he will repent and it means relief after tribulation. If a man sees in a dream that he is eating rosemary, this indicates chivalry, strength, clarity of mind, and victories over those who fight him. Also, seeing a man’s wreath indicates the loss of his money and the loss of his business, but you will be liberated after this loss. It is also It will be food from God and he will obtain a great profit or a great treasure and he will compensate for his need for money and work in his next life. What is the interpretation of the vision of planting rosemary? If a man dreams that he is planting rosemary, this indicates the health and well-being that he will enjoy and recover from illness. The vision of planting rosemary reflects The mountain is also the entry of a young man into a new job and independent work that seeks a lot of time and days and achieves his goal. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a train in a dream: Traveling by train in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the dream is that she does not enter the train for a single woman. The train in a dream is one of the very strange and confusing dreams that we see in our dreams all the time and causes a lot of anxiety for the person to get the correct interpretation of the dream, as the train is one of the means. Transportation in our daily life is very continuous, and sometimes we see in our dreams that we are driving a train in the dream, or the train collides with us, and various other dreams in which the train appears and appears often. Imam Al-Sadiq, the famous dream interpreter, told us, in his interpretations, about many important meanings conveyed by the dream of a train, Which the dreamer must know, interprets the dream correctly and completely through his knowledge and condition. Interpretation of seeing a train in a dream: The train that was moving quickly in the dream and was in the form of a trailer indicates that the dreamer will fall into something that causes him anxiety and confusion, but he will end the matter well. The train is evidence of a journey in which the dreamer escapes from the pressures of life and the routine that he is going through, whether At work or in family life, the train indicates the changes that the dreamer will face in his life and heralds a new step in the future. If the train is slow, the dreamer’s suffering will be prolonged and he will suffer loss in his coming days. If the train is long, the dream shows the influence that the dreamer has. The train indicates Long also indicates a trip to a nearby place, and from this trip the dreamer will gain material things, but if it is slow, it will prevent the dreamer from traveling. If you are driving the train, you are moving towards the right thing in life. If you wait at the station for the train to come, there will be a change in your favor. If you drive your car for a long time, something you expected will be delayed. If the period is short, what you expected happened quickly. Traveling abroad means moving from one place to another and moving from one country to another. Whoever sees that he is traveling, he will wipe the earth, and whoever searches the earth will also travel. Whoever travels in a dream from one place to another that is better than him means that he will move from one situation to another. If the dreamer sees himself traveling by plane, he will obtain an important position in society or in the work that he will do. Anyone who travels to another country may mean that he will divorce his wife and marry another. Whoever travels and sees that he does not He returns and will not return, so it means that he will die or that his death is near. Traveling indicates people’s morals, and if the traveler is poor, he is self-sufficient, and returning from a trip is a dream of repentance, and whoever moves to an unknown house, then he is travelling. Traveling in a dream indicates escaping from reality to a land of imagination where he tries The dreamer wants to forget the fatigue and pain that he faces in his daily life as a result of the problems he faced in his life. Interpretation of a train in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Getting off the train in a dream is evidence that you have lost something dear. A slow train in a dream is evidence of the approaching term. The speed of a train in a dream is evidence of Completing many projects. Seeing a train passing at a slow speed in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the imminent term. Seeing yourself getting off the train in a dream is evidence of lettuce.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing red dates in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing red dates in a dream is considered one of the largest books for researchers in the interpretation of dreams and visions, and through the Trend website, which specializes in the sciences of interpretation and seeing red dates in a dream, it is a dream. Which some have come up with, so we told you about the interpretation of red dates in a dream and its meaning, as well as the interpretation of seeing the purchase of red dates for pregnant women, married women and the elderly, as well as in a man’s dream. If you are interested in knowing the red dates, just follow the article ... Why does Ibn Sirin dream of red dates? Ibn Sirin explained that seeing red dates in a dream indicates kindness and great support for the dreamer in his coming days. Seeing whole red dates in a dream means that the dreamer will soon get a lot of money. Picking red dates in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will get abundant and lawful money from the profits of trade. The complete distribution of red dates in a dream is an indication of the abundance of money spent on God's work and the abundance of charitable works that the dreamer is known for. Eating red dates in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer will get rid of all his worries and problems. The palm tree is completely crushed in a dream, and the dates falling from it are desirable visions, indicating the prestigious position that the dreamer will gain in his work. Seeing red dates in a woman's dream There are red dates in the dream of an ordinary woman - one of the most promising visions for her and her appearance in a scene full of happiness and joy. Dreaming of eating red dates for a single girl at an inappropriate time is a sign that she will be Prone to illness and severe fatigue. Seeing a date for a single woman in a complete dream is one of the visions that show her that she will marry a wealthy man. Interpretation of an unmarried woman eating raw dates in a dream indicates that she will face many problems and experiences in the coming days. Red dates in a married woman’s dream Seeing red dates in the palm of your hand for a married woman in a dream is a complete indication of the happiness and pleasure that she will get in her life. Eating red dates in a dream completely for a woman means kindness, food and obtaining many benefits. Buying dates in a dream is complete for a married woman as if they were red for successful projects and success in business and trade. Why dream of buying red dates for a pregnant woman There are red dates for a pregnant woman – a sign of getting rid of the troubles and problems that she suffered during her sleep. It is also recommended to see red dates in a dream in general for a pregnant woman and it speaks of an easy and easy exit from childbirth. What is the interpretation of using red dates? Some dream researchers have indicated that a person who dreams of eating red dates in their season testifies to goodness, support and abundant blessings. Also, seeing a person in a dream picking dates from the tree and eating them means that He will achieve the desires and goals he wants to achieve. Also, seeing the whole person eating red dates in a dream is an indication that he will get out of his experience and sadness in the near future. If you have a dream and want to interpret it,

title: What do you know about the interpretation of seeing pears in a dream?

preview.html: Dreaming of pears in a dream: Pears are one of the delicious fruits that many people prefer and find great pleasure in eating them, as well as the health benefits that they give us. As for seeing them in a dream, they confuse us a lot and we do not know what they indicate. We decided to collect the sayings of interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and others. What is the interpretation of pears in a dream? Seeing pears in a dream makes the heart happy after a period of suffering and sadness, and when an unmarried young man sees him, he is on his way to achieving his dreams, whether they are related to the dream of marrying a beautiful, fair girl and from a respectable home, or the dream of obtaining a prestigious job. It brings him a lot of money. If a girl sees him, she is ambitious, optimistic, and has a strong enthusiasm for life that makes her indifferent to the traumas she is exposed to. Rather, she takes them as additional strength and a morale booster to continue striving for success. His appearance in the patient’s dream indicates an imminent recovery and getting rid of his pain. And his suffering. Did you have a specific dream or ambition that you wanted to achieve, but with the passage of time and weight gain, you forgot this ambition? If the answer is yes, then your vision of it is evidence of renewed hope and the embodiment of a goal that you may have forgotten before it became easier to achieve than it was in the past. If you eat pears during your sleep, your sorrows will turn into joys and your fears will turn into overwhelming happiness. God's grace and goodness are inexhaustible, but you must continue to pray and stand at the door of the Creator (Glory be to Him) confident of the answer. Pears in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If a student of knowledge sees him, then he will acquire useful knowledge, excel in it, and occupy a high position in the souls of those around him, because of his morals. The good fortune, and his desire to help others freely. As for the fortuneteller who is going through financial hardship and thought of many solutions and was unable to solve his crisis, he will be freed from his crisis and will soon be able to pay what he owes to others and can obtain money. From an inheritance that he does not expect or from the reward that comes to him in his work as a result of his sincerity and diligence. If a person finds himself cooking pears in his dream, then he is an abnormal person and is performing some childish actions that may cause him to lose a lot of the money that he has in a way that is not beneficial to him. The dreamer took a cup of Cold juice is a sign that he will receive the result of his toil throughout the year if he is a student, and his manager will reward him for his mastery of his work. Interpretation of a dream about pears by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen said that seeing pears is good and blessings in the life of the dreamer and expresses the happiness of the family and the stability of the family in which he lives. If the fortuneteller lives In distress or distress due to lack of money and many responsibilities, to the point that he is forced to borrow from others, seeing pears promises him good news of comfort, bringing comfort closer, and changing circumstances for the better. Ibn Shaheen said that the girl she saw in her dream and in the past period was carrying bad events or Negative thoughts about her were able to get the best of her and she almost lost her self-confidence. In a small business, you work hard and grow in record time. If a father gives his son a green pear, then...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a deer in a dream indicates psychological stability and achieving the goals and ambitions that the fortuneteller seeks, but if he sees in a dream that the deer is running away from him quickly, this is evidence that he is in trouble, and when the fortuneteller sees that he is running after the deer in his dream, he realizes it. This indicates the dreamer’s love for trade, and the following is the meaning of a dream about a deer in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Interpretation of the meaning of a dream about a deer in a dream about a single girl. If you see a deer in a single woman’s dream, this means the money that she will get. But if she eats deer meat, this indicates She will obtain great sustenance from her work. But if she sees a deer in her dream and she loves a man, she will marry him soon. But if she sees the blood of a single deer in a dream, this indicates abundant goodness that dominates her. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream for a married woman. As for if a married woman sees a deer Dead, this indicates the loss of some valuable things. If a married woman sees the eyes of a deer in a dream, this means that she heard some sad news. But if a married woman sees that she is eating deer meat and enjoying its taste, this indicates the abundance of goodness that she will receive. If she sees A married woman has deer antlers, this indicates the strength of her character. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a pregnant deer in a dream means that she will give birth to a beautiful child. But if she sees deer antlers, this indicates that her child will have a high status in the future. A woman’s vision indicates A pregnant woman seeing a beautiful deer indicates a broad diet and stability in married life. If a pregnant woman sees the eyes of a deer, this indicates that she will fall into problems and troubles. Interpretation of seeing a deer for a divorced woman: Seeing a divorced deer in a dream indicates a positive change in the coming period. Or if she also sees a deer This indicates that she will marry a man who will compensate her for her first marriage. If she sees a large number of deer, this indicates that many men will approach her. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a man’s dream: If a man sees a deer running in front of him, this indicates that he will get into some problems that It is difficult to get rid of them. As for seeing the antlers of a deer, they show courage and strength of character. As for seeing the eyes of a deer in the dream of a single young man, this indicates that you are hearing sad news. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream for a married man: If a married man sees a large group of beautiful deer, this indicates The life he lives turns into happiness. If a married man sees the blood of a deer in his dream, this indicates that he has a problem. If he sees a dead deer, this indicates that he will be exposed to some unfortunate events. Interpretation of seeing a deer chasing me in a dream. If an unmarried young man sees that a deer Chasing him, this indicates great livelihood and finding work. If a small deer sees in a dream that he is running after him, he will have the opportunity to travel. As for a girl who dreams of a deer chasing her, this indicates success and superiority. Interpretation of seeing deer hunting in a dreamIf a man sees in a dream that he is hunting a deer This indicates his wife’s love and devotion to him. Hunting deer appears in a dream

title: Interpretation of makeup for a man in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of facial makeup in a dreamInterpretation of makeup in a dream for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about makeup for a girlInterpretation of makeup in a dream for a pregnant womanInterpretation of makeup in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of makeup in a dreamMakeup differs from one woman to another depending on her condition. An unmarried girl is different from a married or pregnant woman, as mentioned by interpretation scholars, and we will explain that to you in this explanation. When the dreamer gets married, wearing makeup or imitating the actions of women in the dream does not usually indicate kindness. It lies inside, and others say that he is hiding a secret that he is afraid to reveal, but it will come out and his wife will discover it, because makeup on the face is not hidden from anyone and is visible, unlike internal adornment. But if he sees that an unmarried young man is wearing makeup, then he is between two things: if he is happy with it, this indicates marriage, engagement, or getting what he wants, and if he is sad about his condition or knows that he likes it. A woman will not get the request she wants. If a single young man wears makeup and does not feel sad or happy, he has changed in his life to a new stage from which he can achieve good or evil. According to the beauty or ugliness of the colors he wears. For women, if she is pregnant and sees that she is wearing makeup, she will give birth to a girl who will be happy with her, but if she wears a lot of makeup, her daughter will be cruel, but if she jumps for joy when she puts on makeup in front of a woman it will make her more beautiful, then she will give birth to a boy. In the case of an unmarried girl, if she sees that she is reconciling in front of her wife, or dressing up with someone, or putting one of her makeup on her face to beautify herself, if she is happy with that, then she will get a request that she wants, such as marriage or the good news that she expects, and if she cannot choose her colors. , she will fall into the matter, which is something in which she will be lost and lost in the difficulty of her decision, but if she goes too far with her makeup, then in her heart she is arrogant and does not feel humiliated, and she has revealed a secret that she was afraid to reveal. And when a married woman sees that she is wearing makeup, if she goes to extremes in it, this is a revelation. About something she has been hiding from her husband for a long time, and he will punish her because the face shows the revelation. Exaggeration and exaggeration indicate punishment. She is trying to adorn herself more because she doubts herself. Her husband will marry another woman because he does not care. Interpretation of applying lipstick or eyeliner in a dream. If you use lipstick in a dream, this means that you will resort to methods of deception and deception to get what If you see others using it, know that there are people close to you who are deceiving and exploiting you. If you see lipstick on your hands or clothes, you will get a pattern. If lipstick falls from your lips in a dream, this indicates your humiliation in front of your opponents. You will also lose the person who loves you because you are faking it in front of him. Everything is money, and everything A woman, and everything is desirable for a righteous man, but undesirable for an immoral man, and the inclination is a boy. Kohl indicates an increase in the light of vision. The dye indicates concealing actions and acts of obedience and concealing poverty from the eyes of men. If the dye swirls, it will cover him, and if it does not swirl, it will reveal his condition, and what we mentioned about beard dye.
